Package orego.heuristic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CaptureHeuristic
    The value of a move is the number of stones it captures.
    DynamicPatternHeuristic  
    EscapeHeuristic
    Tries to save any friendly group put in atari by the last move, by capturing or extending.
    Heuristic
    Adjusts the probability of playing a move using domain-specific knowledge.
    HeuristicList
    Note: we do not override ArrayList since we need the raw speed of a native array.
    LearnedPatternHeuristic  
    PatternHeuristic  
    PatternHeuristicPatterns
    Simple container class for holding the thousands of patterns.
    PatternHeuristicPatterns2  
    SpecificPointHeuristic
    Recommands a given point.
